faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about domain registration

q1.question: How long does domain registration take?
q1.answer: Most domains are registered instantly. In rare cases, it may take up to 24 hours for complete propagation.

q2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q2.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers in both EUR and SYP currencies.

q3.question: Can I transfer my existing domain to Sy-net?
q3.answer: Yes! We offer free domain transfers with our competitive renewal rates and premium support.

q4.question: Do you offer domain privacy protection?
q4.answer: Absolutely. We provide free WHOIS privacy protection with all domain registrations to keep your information secure.

footer.about: Sy-net is Syria's premier domain registrar, providing fast, secure, and reliable domain registration services since 2020. We're committed to helping businesses establish their online presence with confidence.
